channel.title: SFoL14: Regicide II
channel.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/8UVDKZf.png[/img] # The King has been murdered, and the noble Castle Adiart has been thrown into complete disarray! ### The newly rebranded SFoL: Regicide is back and better than ever! ### Rules 1. Follow the [Global Forum Rules](http://forum.imperium42.com/t/global-forum-rules-please-read-first/244) 2. Be respectful to the moderators and your fellow players. 3. Don't be inactive. If you do not post within a 24-hour period, you will be prodded. Failure to respond to a prod within 12 hours or receiving two prods will result in your removal from the game. 4. Do not quote/screenshot private host messages. 5. Don't throw the game. Always play with the intent of helping your faction win. 6. No editing or deleting posts without express moderator permission. 7. No posting after majority is reached or at night. We won't lock the thread, and instead the honor system will be used. Repeated or egregious failure to comply will result in your removal from the game. 8. It's a game - have fun!
### Gameplay - There is no set day length. Instead, day continues until majority is reached. - There is a total time bank of 300 hours of daytime. - Nights will be approximately 24 hours long. Extensions will not be granted for forgetting to send in an action. - Actions are performed by sending myself and eevee a message on the PM I send you with your role card. - The members of the Unseen cannot communicate with each outher outside of the game in any fashion (however, using in-game abilities to communicate is allowed). - The Psychic and Priest will talk with their targets via private messages that eevee or myself will create. - All classes used will be found in the [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/class-cards-for-sfol/1323]SFoL Regicide Class Cards Thread[/url]. - Roles will be revealed at the start of the game. - Factions will not flip upon death. - Any role can be either Blue Dragon or Unseen. - All members of the Unseen may kill, but they each have a one-night cooldown on this ability. - One Unseen member has killed the King, and must wait one night before being able to kill. - One player will be a Traitor, appearing to be a member of the Blue Dragon to others but winning with the Unseen and counting towards their numbers. - The Traitor does not know the identity of the Unseen, nor do the Unseen know they identity of the Traitor. - When you receive a class card, you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it, or else your spot may be forfeit. - The Unseen win if the Blue Dragon run out of time, or if their numbers equal or exceed that of the remaining Blue Dragon players. - These rules are subject to change until the game begins.
### Executions - To accuse someone, say "**/vote [player]**". - To rescind your vote, say "**/unvote [player]**". - To vote for no lynch, say ""**/vote NoLynch**". - Making your vote obvious (bolded, on their own line, etc.) will make it less likely to be missed by us. - Vote counts will be given whenever the moderators are available to do so. You may request one by pinging both eevee and myself. - When majority has been reached, the day ends immediately. Please cease all posting until a moderator returns to officially end the day. - **Twilight posting by the Blue Dragon will use up the remaining time at twice the usual rate.** Although twilight posting by the Traitor and Unseen will not use any time, vigilant players are sure to notice this discrepancy. This is applied at moderator discretion, and will not take effect until a few minutes after the hammer.
### After The Night - You will be told what happened to you in your PM, and day will begin.
### Journals and Death Notes - Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed. - Death Notes will be allowed, but are subject to the discretion of both hosts.
### Rolelist - **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon[/color]** - **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon[/color]** - **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon[/color]** - **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon[/color]** - **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon[/color]** - **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon[/color]** - **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon[/color]** - **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon[/color]** - **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon[/color]** - **[color=darkred]Traitor[/color]** - **[color=purple]Unseen[/color]** - **[color=purple]Unseen[/color]**
### Players 1. **Insanity** the Paladin 2. **NozBugz** the Priest 3. **Marluxion** the Physician 4. **Wolfy** the Princess 5. **PokemonKidRyan** the Court Wizard 6. **CaptainNerbins** the Noble 7. **Hippolytus** the Sheriff 8. **NuclearBurrito** the Knight 9. **Moleland** the Prince 10. **Frostwolf103** the Psychic 11. **Simon** the Butler 12. **Ingeel** the Observer
### Graveyard 1. **CaptainNerbins** lynched Day 1 2. **Ingeel** killed Night 1 3. **PokemonKidRyan** lynched Day 2 4. **NozBugz** killed Night 2 5. **Marluxion** killed Night 2 6. **Insanity** lynched Day 3 7. **Wolfy** lynched Day 4 8. **Moleland** killed Night 4 9. **Simon** killed Night 4 10. **Frostwolf103** killed Day 5
### Timeline - **Day 1** - 22.75 hours - **Day 2** - 60.5 hours - **Day 3** - 79.5 hours - **Day 4** - 3 hours
### Links - [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol14-regicide-ii/43522/4?u=orangeandblack5]Start of Day 1[/url] - [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol14-regicide-ii/43522/375?u=orangeandblack5]End of Day 1[/url] - [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol14-regicide-ii/43522/388?u=orangeandblack5]Start of Day 2[/url] - [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol14-regicide-ii/43522/734?u=orangeandblack5]End of Day 2[/url] - [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol14-regicide-ii/43522/738?u=orangeandblack5]Start of Day 3[/url] - [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol14-regicide-ii/43522/1043?u=orangeandblack5]End of Day 3[/url] - [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol14-regicide-ii/43522/1050?u=orangeandblack5]Start of Day 4[/url] - [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol14-regicide-ii/43522/1100?u=orangeandblack5]End of Day 4[/url] - [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol14-regicide-ii/43522/1101?u=orangeandblack5]Start of Day 5[/url]

item.title: SFoL14: Regicide II
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
Go re-read the start of this very thread. Most early discussion was around pre-game questions and statements like this:

I had actually answered this before I realized I was an idiot for doing so and quickly edited out my answer to instead say “thanks for confirming”.
Necesary Disclaimer: I’m not calling PKR out, this was probably unintentional on his part. Just take it as a lesson for everybody to learn from.

Read full topic

item.title: SFoL14: Regicide II

item.description:
how does asking a question make someone likely to be good

i can see it for the other way 'round, but im not sure for that way.

Read full topic

item.title: SFoL14: Regicide II
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
oh shoot I totally forgot to talk about this

This game was almost re-rolled partway into Day 1. The only reason it wasn’t is that both Nuclear and Hippo decided to let it continue.

Please, in all future games, direct all setup questions to the mod in your private role message. @PokemonKidRyan in particular, and also @Marluxion, asked questions (including in the sign-ups thread) such that it made them very likely to be Blue Dragon. I’ve seen games re-rolled for much less than this in the past.

Although I highly doubt that this was the intent of these questions, your private chain exists for good reason. Please make use of it.

Read full topic
